select pg.id, pg.product_id as productId, pg.group_id as groupId, pg.shop_id as shopId,pg.sort, pg.group_p_id as groupPId,g.group_name as groupName,g.is_child,g.is_first_parents from t_mall_product_group pg left join t_mall_group g on g.id=pg.group_id where pg.is_delete= 0 AND g.`is_delete`=0
and pg.product_id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by pg.sort

select pg.id, pg.product_id as productId, pg.group_id as groupId, pg.shop_id as shopId,pg.sort, pg.group_p_id as groupPId,g.group_name as groupName,g.is_child,g.is_first_parents from t_mall_product_group pg left join t_mall_group g on g.id=pg.group_id where pg.product_id = #{proId} and pg.is_delete= 0 AND g.`is_delete`=0 order by pg.sort

SELECT distinct(a.group_id) as group_id,b.group_name,b.is_child,i.image_url FROM t_mall_product_group a LEFT JOIN t_mall_group b ON a.group_id=b.id left join t_mall_image_associative i on i.ass_type=2 and i.ass_id=b.id WHERE a.is_delete=0 AND b.is_delete=0 AND a.shop_id= #{shopId} and b.group_p_id=#{groupParentId} order by b.sort,b.id desc
